¬´ Elle ¬ª en est en quelque sorte √† la fois le symbole et le garant, le sens profond et la double signification : on vous prend pour des cons et vous n‚Äôavez pas d‚Äôautre choix que de l‚Äôaccepter."

Nom: La presse et la justice
Description: La libert√© d&#39expression essentielle √† la presse comme √† la d√©mocratie est en accusation aujourd&#39hui. La production de la famille Boulat s&#39inscrit dans la tradition du tr√®s grand photojournalisme, √† l&#39ancienne serait-on tent√© de dire, aux c√¥t√©s des Robert Capa ou des Lee Miller. Nom: Freedom of Expression in Islam
Description: In recent years the subject of freedom of expression has become a topic of heated debate. &#39Freedom of Expression in Islam&#39 offers the first and only detailed presentation in English of freedom of expression from both the legal and moral perspectives of Islam. This work is a pioneering attempt in examining both the evidence on freedom of expression in the sources of the &#39Shari&#39a&#39 and the limitations, whether moral, legal or theological, that Islam imposes on the valid exercise of this freedom. &#39Freedom of Expression in Islam&#39 is informative not only on the subject of the possibilities of freedom of expression within Islam, but also on the cultural tradition of Islam and its guidelines on social behaviour. &#39Freedom of Expression in Islam&#39 is part of a series dedicated to the fundamental rights and liberties in Islam and should be read in conjunction with &#39The Dignity of Man: An Islamic Perspective&#39 and &#39Freedom, Equality and Justice in Islam&#39.
